metadata.title: CVE-2023-4104 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid Polkit Authentication check and missing authenticationrequirements for D-Bus methods allowed any local user to configurearbitrary VPN setups. *This bug only affects Mozilla VPN on Linux. Otheroperating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Mozilla VPNclient for Linux < v2.16.1.

criterions.comment: mozillavpn package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
